triples.name: In silico clinical trials
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a credibility assessment workflow specifically designed for in silico clinical trials, which are the main focus of the work.

triples.name: Medical device
triples.relevance: Medical devices are the primary subject of evaluation in the ISCTs discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Clinical trial
triples.relevance: Clinical trials provide the traditional framework that ISCTs aim to complement or replace for medical device evaluation.

triples.name: Computer simulation
triples.relevance: Computer simulation is the core computational technique underlying all in silico clinical trials.

triples.name: Verification and validation
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how verification and validation apply to ISCTs as key components of credibility assessment.

triples.name: Uncertainty quantification
triples.relevance: Uncertainty quantification is explicitly identified as a key consideration for assessing ISCT credibility.

triples.name: Validation and verification (medical devices)
triples.relevance: Medical device-specific validation and verification standards are relevant to assessing ISCT credibility for device evaluation.
